    WIP Entangled Insights

    05 Jan 2022

    A Feminist Reconceptualization of Insight

    This paper is a working draft that was originally produced between the summer of 2020 and spring of 2021. We've chosen to publish the document as a draft because it marks a significant milestone in how we began to understand the benefits and complexities of using feminist theory in visualization research. That summer we read Meeting the Universe Halfway by Karen Barad and this paper is a result of discussing and theorizing Barad's theory of entanglements with the field of visualization's theorizing about insights. Since then, our thoughts have changed and it is likely some later draft of this paper will be quite different, but we provide this paper as an archive.
